message: hello Kiara!! congrats on 1 million! you have worked so hard to get here, you really deserve it so much. I’m so happy to see you hit this huge milestone ♡ not to make this too sappy but, I can’t thank you enough for everything that you do. I’m currently going through probably the roughest period of my life. last year I lost all my friends, dropped out of college and have been very depressed since. everyday has felt so numb for me. but since you joined Hololive I have had something to look forward to everyday and my I feel like I now have a reason to wake up every morning. watching your streams makes me so so happy, you make me smile so much. I really don’t know what this past year would have been like without you, so I am extremely grateful. thank you Kiara. I hope you can continue to grow and have fun being in Hololive. I will always be here to support you

Dear 10chou, Happy 1 mil! We're all happy to you see reached so far and achieved so much and we're excited to see what unveils in the future, it's been an amazing journey to be with you. You wanted to make us proud time and time again, but I think you already made us proud with how much you've given us, you're a blessing to many of us who can relax and relate through you. You're truly a bright vibrant sun in our own dark lonely world. Just remember there's a lot of us who are here for you, 10chou. 10chou was just a nickname that came from your voice acting from Sakuna but overtime it means a lot to me. I'll tell you what it means in a SC I plan to give in some time in the future. I know you told us that isn't necessary to support you but I want to do it out of my own will, I just love you too much. kove ya and take care.

Congrats on 1mil subs Tenchou! Fubuki may showed me Hololive but you were the one who made me stay and watching you grow, reaching every milestones is super inspiring. Thank you for being who you are and keep doing what you are doing!
Congrats on 1M Tenchou! Keep on soaring higher!
Congratulations on 1 Million!

Congrats on 1 Million chickens, boss!
I’m so so happy and proud of you for hitting this milestone. You are a super hardworking, talented, kind and amazing person,  that I truly admire lot! You deserve this and so much more! Keep being awesome!

Congrats on 1M, Tenchou!!
Thank you so so much for getting me through these hard times, I wished I had been more active earlier since your debut in Twitter... You've had been an Inspiration to me and many people...well, Chikins were too,
A great phoenix so talented, kindhearted, and just an amazing ggs hotwings you are, 
I couldn't ask for more But QUEEN you deliver!!, And with this milestone you achieved I would say You deserve it and You deserve even more~ 
We love you Tenchou, and again Congrats!! Stay CUTTEE (I mean you're always cute hihi)

Congrats on 1 Million chickens, boss!
I’m so so happy and proud of you for hitting this milestone. You are a super hardworking, talented, kind and amazing person,  that I truly admire lot! You deserve this and so much more! Keep being awesome!

My draw, my dear and beloved Kiara, was born thank to you and your talent to inspiring people. Thank to you i was motivated to continue studying, keep being my best and discover myself over what i can be and what I'm, to the point where, right now i will a leader of important things in the future. Thank you so much over these months, celebrate your 1M, you're the most amazing phoenix i've ever meet. Continue being great, continue being you and continue to amazing us.
Now, KANPAI AND LET'S HECKING GO! SMILE AND CELEBRATE KIARA! SMILE AND CELEBRE!!!!!

Thank you Tenchou for these fantastic months. Thanks to you, countless journeys, conversations and songs have blessed my days. 
I couldn't be prouder of you, Kiara, my Oshi. Congratulations for the 1M, may many more successes come in the future!

Congrats on 1M Tenchou! I want to thank you for all the hard work you have done, Holotalk, songs, great content, etc,etc, a genius phoenix indeed. I ended up falling into the rabbit hole thanks to you and I don't regret any second of it. You came into my life with your kind, warm and cherful personality like the sunlight in the morning. 1M is a big achievement but is just the beginning of more to come and we will keep supporting you all the way to the top, and to more fun and memorable moments. Love you Tenchou, best boss <3

Thank you Kiara for all the effort you put in your streams, growing your channel to 1M is not easy job. Hope you feel proud of all your accomplishments and I want you to know we will keep supporting you all the way

おめでとう Kiara on 1 milion!
It is honor to witness your journey since beginning and watch you conquering difficulties, fulfilling dreams with all your hard work, dedication and tenacity. Thank you for letting us support you
Congratulations on 1 Million!
Thank you for bringing us so much joy and sunshine,  congratulations on your 1M subscription!
Congrats on having 1 million chickens following behind you Kiara!

Congratulations Tenchou! 1 million employees standing with you, and you mean so much to so many of them. You work so hard and brought hours of happiness to us, and it all built up to this. Thank you for everything Kiara!
Happy 1M Subcribers Kiara!

Congrats on 1 Mill subs, tenchou
You finally get to catch along with your genmates.
I can't always catch up your streams and i can't send you some SCs but I'll always support you no matter what
Please keep your bottom leftness along with you, because that's my favorite side of you
Congratulations on 1 Million!
Congratulations Kiara! Viva la Kiara!

A fanart inspired by stage girl Aijou Karen from Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight, who never gives up no matter how often she fails:
"Atop a stage brimming with stardust, clad in flowers of love that have so magnificently bloomed.
I have been reborn and jump onto the dazzling stage.
99th Class — Karen Aijou! We will all do Starlight!"
Congrats to 1 million subscribers and I hope you can soon get your 3D, too, and show everyone how bright you can shine!
Congratulations on 1mil subs Tenchou

You did it!
One full million chickens employed in KFP, watching and working with glee.
I'm happy to have been witness of your meteoric rise to fame and fast food franchise global domination :D.
You're the sweetest and nicest boss someone could ask for!
It's hard to put into words how much your streams have done for me this year, but it was really a lot and I'm glad you happened into our lives.
Now onwards to many more years and chickens!
Glory to KFP! Viva la Kiara! Thank you Kiara.

Kiara, congratulations on reaching 1 million subs!! Thank you for being resilient & always persevering over all the obstacles you have faced throughout your adventures. We love & appreciate you so much!!

Congratulations Kiara!  You've got a lot of employees on your payroll now!  Thanks again for inspiring me to draw again, I had a blast drawing you and some KFP staff.  We all love you, and I'm excited for what the future holds!

This drawing is very important to me as an artist and a fan. Along with lots of arts from KFP, hope this drawing makes you smile and be proud of what you've been doing. 
Good Job, Kiara!

Dear Kiara,
Orange lilly represents passionate love and friendship and I think this flower suits how lovely KFP are as a big family.
Congratulation on employing 1 millon chicken! Next time I will draw a better pic for you!
Sincerely.

Dear Kiara,
I want to congratulate you on this momentous occasion. An army of one million chickens is no joke. KFP is truly rising in stonks! Our best Tenchou deserves nothing less than this huge milestone. I'm very glad that many more people have gotten to know you. And hopefully, appreciate and love you as much as we at KFP do. Also, thank you for all the fun and amazing music and streams. And for always making us feel like a big family in KFP. Never change, boss. Remember that as long as the boss is happy, the chickens are happy. Can't wait to spend many more memorable moments with you. Love you so much, Tenchou! Congratulations once again! VIVA LA KIARA!!!

They say you can make a wish when blowing away the seeds of a dandelion. Whatever it is that you are wishing for Kiara, I hope it comes true!
Thank you for everything and congrats on 1 million
